name: Courtier

skills.name: Outmaneuver
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Denigrate
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Whirling Blow
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. Has a 33% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
